subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: {{w|Jerry Norman (sinologist)|Jerry Norman}} reconstructs Common Min ''*tɔi<sup>5</sup>'' based on the coastal Min forms; it is unclear how the Min Bei forms relate to the coastal Min forms. Possibly from {{och-l|段|section; segment}}; compare {{och-l|短|short}} > Xiamen {{cog|nan-hok|-}} {{m|und|té}} ({{zh-ref|Coblin, n.d.}}).
